img1.title: Swamp Spawn
img1.info: Late night drawing. Planned to do fast sketch but ended up drawing for 5 hours.

img2.title: Monkey Ninja
img2.info: Practiced lineart work and folds on this one. Was not intended to be a monkey at first, but the ears out of the mask were irresistible.

img3.title: Waterpipe Monster
img3.info: Initial idea here was to have waterpipe/mexican monster with sombrero, but the hat didn't fit the theme I wanted.

img4.title: Peaclock
img4.info: Ok you got the pun here. Clock and peacock together, in a steampunk way. You can check time-lapse of the drawing on
